price: blagodat će to od Gospodara tvoga biti; to će, zaista, biti uspjeh veliki!
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
